name: sonarqube
description: Continuous inspection of code quality with static analysis

params.name: hostUrl
params.description: Base URL of the SonarQube server

params.name: token
params.description: User, Project Analysis, or Global Analysis token to authenticate with SonarQube

params.name: workingDirectory
params.description: Relative or absolute path on Kaholo agent to the code repository to scan

params.name: projectKey
params.description: A string that identifies the project - up to 400 characters, no spaces, alphanumeric, "-_.:", at least one non-digit

params.name: sources
params.description: Optional paths to directories containing main source files, one per line

params.name: additionalArguments
params.description: Additional arguments to pass to the sonar-scanner CLI, one argument per line

params.name: projectName
params.description: A user-friendly name for the new project

params.name: projectKey
params.description: A string that identifies the project - up to 400 characters, no spaces, alphanumeric, "-_.:", at least one non-digit

params.name: organization
params.description: A string identifing the organization, if using SonarCloud

params.name: visibility
params.description: Public visibility means any authenticated user can browse the project without specific permissions granted.

methods.name: getViolations
methods.description: The total count of issues in all states

params.name: componentName
params.description: The Project Key of the project for which to get violations (total issues) data

params.name: componentName
params.description: The Project Key of the project for which to get code coverage data

params.name: query
params.description: An optional string to search for in the Project Keys - if ommitted all projects will be returned.
